system.note: Space Marines Only. Ultramarines variant set of two Power Swords. When wielded together grant the wielder the "Wall of Steel" talent, and +20 to Parry Tests in addition to the +10 from the Balanced Quality.

description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Balanced, Power Field

Note: Space Marines Only. Ultramarines variant set of two Power Swords. When wielded together grant the wielder the "Wall of Steel" talent, and +20 to Parry Tests in addition to the +10 from the Balanced Quality.
